column1: #Text=\u201CWhat we need is one bylaw that applies without question to everybody,\u201D he said.
#Text=\u201CWe cannot have the Wild West, but we also cannot have a city that in some way ignores the march of technology and time.\u201D
#Text=The problem has arisen due to the totally different treatment the two sectors of the taxi service are subject to.
#Text=Governments like regulation & collecting money and Uber doesn't allow them to do that.
